name: Mega Parkour [Beta] 1.1
description:
This is a parkour game. It has no winning, that's why it's a beta. I will update this soon so keep in touch! :)

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

You can go up to triple jumping

Updates:
  - Made custom cursor work

  - Made losing available

PRO TIP - As long as you are touching the ground, your jumps will be reset. It may help you when you are gonna fall into the void.
